item.title: Week 02 - Working with Data (Part 1)
item.description: Lecture 02a - Introducing ggplot2 Slides Video Lecture Lecture 02b - Grammar of Graphics Slides Video Lecture Lecture 03 - Verbs for Cleaning Data Slides Video Lecture Lecture 04 - Structuring Notebooks Slides Video Lecture Data for Assignments The data that you need for many of the assignments this semester is available as an R package named testDriveR.
